institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Ministry of Employment and Labor Consignment Project Subsidy Processing Rules/Article 2 (Definition)
contents: Article 2 (Definition) The meanings of terms used in this rule are as follows: 1. Entrusted financial institution refers to a financial institution or postal office under Article 108 of the Enforcement Decree of the Employment Insurance Act, which has a firm banking system approved by the Minister of Employment and Labor. Refers to a financial institution or post office entrusted with the payment of support funds by ., 2. Firm banking refers to electronic financial transactions for payment of support funds through computer network connection between the Ministry of Employment and Labor and the entrusted financial institution., 3. Fund disbursement office. This refers to a fund disbursement employee appointed by the chairman to perform the work entrusted to him in accordance with Article 145, Paragraph 8 of the Enforcement Decree of the Employment Insurance Act. 4. The person in charge of account deposit is the person who ultimately processes the payment of support funds, and is affiliated with the organization. Refers to an employee at the level of manager or higher designated by the head of the organization.
